thread.title: APRIL HOFFMAN
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by APRIL HOFFMAN

author: APRIL HOFFMAN
title: APRIL HOFFMAN
text: I recently purchased a portable vaporizer that had a defect. I contacted the support staff that confirmed the problem. They provided a return label and quick refund. It's important to keep all packaging and enclosures to facilitate trouble free return. I will use the company for future purchases.
